p: The California Department of Finance forecasts that the population of LAC will grow from 9.8 (today) to 11.5 million in 2060 (ref. 8), and this will necessitate the construction of new dwelling units to accommodate the additional inhabitants. Tracking the population growth with Southern California Association of Government's housing forecast through 2030 (which includes changing household size), we develop bi-decadal housing growth rates for LAC ( Supplementary Table 19). We apply these housing growth rates based on population to all the scenarios, starting with the building stock from the Assessor's database.
